TopicTitle: Interstellar fuel switching, Nuke engine. Which fuel? No "liquid fuel" option..

Articles.Content:
I installed the that mod specifically to make better use of fuel tanks when using the nuke engine.

However I cannot seem to make any use of it in that regard.

there is no "liquid fuel" option for any of the tank configs..

There is "Oxygen" " carbon dioxide" etc etc but no "liquid fuel"

is there one that will actually work with that engine or do I need to try something else?

EDIT:

Tried them all, none of them work at all with that engine.

What is a mod that will allow me to add JUST liquid fuel to tanks?

Edited September 1, 2015 by Wingnutt

Do you have RealFuels installed?

They redefine available resources for some engines and tanks.

Hi Wingnutt

I also first installled IFS, but then i realized its not appropriate for Stock fuel tanks... There is a simple STOCK FUEL SWITCH Mod, and it works perfekt with the Stockparts... greetings!

Find it a few pages below in the addon releases!

Edited September 1, 2015 by Mikki
